data.title: East Bay Community Foundation
data.meta_description: EBCF is a registered 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization. View our IRS 990s, audited financials, and quarterly investment performance reports.
data.text:
East Bay Community Foundation manages approximately $600 million in assets and our value for transparency has earned us four out of four stars from Charity Navigator.

East Bay Community Foundation is a registered 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization and our Employer Identification Number (EIN) is 94-6070996. On this page you can download our IRS 990 Forms and Audited Financials for the last three years, and our most recent quarterly investment performance report.
